divs: sighting detailsi was hanging outside in my backyard with the doggies (enjoying odell's new seasonal brew) when i spotted a star\plane-like anomaly. it started out like any other airbus sighting - it seemed to fly up from the eastern horizon to about a 20 degree declination and remained generally stationary for about 30 minutes. the anomaly seemed to drift an estimated 20+ miles to the north, but at this point i started to get rather bored and retired to write up this report. hopefully someone else caught a glimpse!
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around June 4th 2009
Summary: Plane-like anomaly rises over Horsetooth Reservoir - remains motionless for 30-40 mins.
